refnamediv.refpurpose: Terminates Scilab or decreases the pause level

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The quit command has two different meanings depending on the calling context:

varlistentry.term: If there is no pause active,

listitem.para: then the quit command makes Scilab terminate, even if the command is called inside a function.

varlistentry.term: If there is a pause active,

listitem.para: then the quit command makes abort of the instructions started at this pause level and terminates the current pause level.
